choices.name: c_1834bdc4_c106_4ceb_be6e_df6b65169852
choices.choiceText: D Create a process using Process Builder that executes an action type called 'Send Survey Invitation' when the value of the custom field changes.

value.stringValue: D Create a process using Process Builder that executes an action type called 'Send Survey Invitation' when the value of the custom field changes.

screens.name: p_12d7851f_2b0e_405d_a5ca_a33057201a12
screens.label: Page 1

fields.name: q_2a81bdbe_34be_40ee_957e_c0b67dd93d62
fields.fieldText: A developer is developing a Visualforce page with a custom controller. The page needs to work in an organization where users have different languages and locales. Which of the following should the developer do to minimize any language dependencies in the code?

fields.name: q_bb60f367_4741_4444_a424_5b751d544f7a
fields.fieldText: Cosmic Lights uses the standard Contact object to store information about people associated with B2B companies that purchase the products manufactured by the company. A custom object is used to store information about sales orders. When a person associated with a company purchases a product, a custom field on the person's contact record is updated by a salesperson manually. When this field is updated, a survey should be sent to the person to gather certain information, such as the reason behind the purchase and how their previous purchases influenced the recent purchase decision. What solution should be recommended to meet this requirement?

screens.pausedText: To pick up where you left off, refresh this page, or open the survey again.
